page.title: 03People in Sorbie
page.content: Sorbie is a friendly peaceful village with a{population}of 112 people.26 of these people are 'locals' and have lived here all their lives, and 35 people have moved into Sorbie from surrounding farms or villages. However ,most of the population of Sorbie have come from other towns in England,Ireland and the North of Scotland.The various reasons for moving to Sorbie are either to be near their jobs or family,or to retire.Some people came because they liked the beautiful countryside. The people like living in Sorbie because it has a peaceful, friendly atmosphere. They also find the {shop} and the{Post Office}very useful. However, there are some{ {disadvantages}.For example, there is no public transport;there are few shops;and Sorbie is on a busy road.
